Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, You spent hours developing a fabulous benefits package, only to find out a mere third of your workforce read through the material. How are you going to improve your benefits engagement? Attend this HR.com + PGi webinar, Boring Benefits? Rejuvenate the way you Communicate!, to learn about a variety of benefits communication techniques designed to increase benefits engagement for your workforce. You'll get:
• Inspired ideas for new hire orientations
• Guidance on how to conduct virtual health and benefit fairs
• Creative social media tips for open enrollment
You'll also hear how PGi has more than doubled participation in our HDHP consumerism plan. Register now, it's free!
Boring Benefits? Rejuvenate the way you Communicate! March 6, 2014 11am Eastern Time Click here to register!
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title}{!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
